text: Joseph Rene Marcel Pronovost (June 15, 1930 â€“ April 26, 2015) was a Canadian professional ice hockey defenceman and coach. He played in 1,206 games over 20 National Hockey League (NHL) seasons and for the Detroit Red Wings and Toronto Maple Leafs between 1950 and 1970. Pronovost died on April 26, 2015, after a brief illness, aged 84. ==References== ==Other websites== * * Category:1930 births Category:2015 deaths Category:Canadian ice hockey players Category:Detroit Red Wings players Category:Disease-related deaths in Ontario Category:Sportspeople from Quebec Category:Toronto Maple Leafs players Category:Ontario Hockey League players Category:Ice hockey defencemen
title: Marcel Pronovost
